title.rendered: “IDF to Demolish Home of Terrorist Involved in February 2024 Route 1 Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF announced its intention to confiscate and demolish the home of one of the terrorists who carried out the attack on Route 1, in which Matan Elmalich, may his memory be a blessing, was murdered in February 2024.

Over the weekend (Friday), a notice was issued regarding the intention to confiscate and demolish the house where the terrorist Katham Zouhara resided in the village of Za’atra. The terrorist, along with other terrorists, carried out a serious shooting attack on Thursday, February 22, 2024, on Route 1 near the A-Zaim checkpoint, where Matan Elmalich, may his memory be a blessing, was murdered and several other civilians were injured.
